title: how brands grinding $50k months in the US could be PRINTING $200k/mo in Vatican (geomaxxing)
preview_text: most ecom brands are losing money by being in saturated markets and spending $100+ to acquire customers in the US while their EXACT same offer could acquire customers for $20 in eastern europe.
